PlayerBuilder.BuildPlayer Method

declarationpublic static void BuildPlayer (BuildPlayerOptions buildPlayerOptions, string version, uint build, PostBuildProcess postProcess);
namespaceWondeluxeEditor.Build

Build a Unity application.

Parameters

The BuildPlayerOptions used to build the application.

Build number.
